item.title: Agile Project Retrospectives the perfect measure
item.description: Seriously - Next time you’re running a project retrospective or other review, keep a count of your WTFs/minute.

item.title: Piwik Web Analytics best free alternative
item.description: Have you tried Piwik yet? If you’ve been using Google Analytics and started to wonder what alternative web analytic tools are out there then look no further then Piwik.

item.title: Are you on top of your Social Media Marketing Strategy for 2011?
item.description: You’re never too late to start your 2011 Social Media Marketing Strategy - This year has gone so fast and I missed starting my Marketing Strategy on 1/1/11.

item.title: [video] Online Shopping with Swedish Twist - 3 LiveShop
item.description: Have you seen this - This has to be the future of customer service and online shopping — say goodbye to messy forms or complicated shopping charts.

item.title: Get your message right - Effective Marketing Strategy
item.description: Creating an effective marketing strategy during a recession is tough. When you’re faced with budget cuts to your marketing spend or trying to figure out what you can do with no budget then you need a plan.

item.title: 5 steps to create an effective marketing strategy in a downturn
item.description: Creating an effective marketing strategy during a recession is tough. When you’re faced with budget cuts to your marketing spend or trying to figure out what you can do with no budget then you need something better than a good plan, you’re needing a marketing strategy that leads to success.
